creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: standing figure wearing a hat, rowing a boat in calm water at LLC; 2 large dark land formations with other lighter-triangular forms on opposite bank; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'#10022 \'QUIET AFTERNOON\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-12\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS NY, 11375, USA\', stamped on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Quiet Afternoon
